channel.title: Simple auto clicker that's spaced out by 7 secs
channel.description: I need an auto click that has a 7 second waiting time,and i would like it to click this color:2832480

item.title: Simple auto clicker that's spaced out by 7 secs
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Here you go. This script is easy to setup and if you want anything else added, just let me know

[code=geshi]//Auto clicker by IP-Drowner
// Setup Lines 9-14 below then let the script do the rest.
// If you want more things to be added, please let me know from where you
// got this script from.

program AutoClicker;

const
LeftC = True; //Left click?
WaiTT = 7; //How many seconds to wait?
QKey = ‘q’; //Emergency termination key. Press this key to stop the script.
MouseClick = True; //Do not colour find? Just click at mouse location.
Times = 10; //How many times to click. Left 0 for infinite.
Colour = 2832480; //Colour to find. If MouseClick is set to True,
//just leave as 0.

var
x, xx, y, yy, Time: Integer;

procedure DoClicking;
begin
if(not(MouseClick)) then
begin
GetClientDimensions(xx, yy);
if(FindColor(x, y, Colour, 0, 0, xx, yy)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x, y);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x, y, LeftC);
end;
end;
if(MouseClick) then
begin
Wait(150)
GetMousePos(x, y);
ClickMouse(x, y, LeftC);
end;
Wait(WaiTT*1000-150);
end;

begin
if(Times=0) then
begin
repeat
DoClicking;
Until(IsKeyDown(QKey));
end else
begin
repeat
DoClicking;
Time:=Time+1;
Until(IsKeyDown(QKey)) or (Time>=Times);
end;
end.[/code]

Copy and paste into SCAR.

Read full topic
item.source: Simple auto clicker that's spaced out by 7 secs
